name: RedBean CVSbook Tweak
description:
Mainly done to ensure there was no X-axis (horiz.) scrollbar when reading.
Limits text width to about 580px so that eye does not have to make as much horizontal movement to read each line; and changes the fonts (none are set by the site; changes from my Firefox defaults)
additional_info:
Fonts: used M$ "C" series serif Cambria for normal text and "Book Antigua" for ul / ol list item blocks.

Changed default margin-bottom for li so that more space eases reading.
